name: pabawi
description: Pabawi - Web interface for Bolt automation tool

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.dev:fullstack: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend && npm run dev:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend
